FilmFrameFocus is a personal exploration of the history of film and the techniques that bring it to life. The posts on this site delve into elements of cinema that have captured my interest and inspired deeper investigation.

While FilmFrameFocus reflects my longstanding passion for cinema, my professional work involves numerous film and television productions. For work-related inquiries, you can find me on LinkedIn.

You can also follow my cinematic journey on Letterboxd.

For any other questions, comments, or just to say hi, you can email me at trevor@filmframefocus.com.
